panels.description:
Description: Current number of constraint templates
"All NS"

Understanding this metric: Gatekeeper subscribes to a watch on all ConstraintTemplate resources. Whenever one is created or deleted on the cluster, this count gets updated.
panels.title: Total constraint templates

targets.expr:
group(kube_namespace_labels{namespace!~"(d8-.+|kube-.+)",namespace=~"$namespace",label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy=~"(restricted|baseline|privileged)",label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action=~"(deny|warn|dryrun)"}) by (namespace, label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy, label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action)
or
label_replace(group(kube_namespace_labels{namespace!~"(d8-.+|kube-system)",namespace=~"$namespace",label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy=~
"(privileged|restricted|baseline)",label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action!~"(deny|warn|dryrun)"}) by (namespace, label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy, label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action), "label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action", "$default_action", "label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action", ".*")
or
label_replace(group(kube_namespace_labels{namespace!~"(d8-.+|kube-system)",namespace=~"$namespace",label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy!~
"(privileged|restricted|baseline)",label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action=~"(deny|warn|dryrun)"}) by (namespace, label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy, label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action), "label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy", "$default_policy", "label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy", ".*")
or
label_replace(label_replace(group(kube_namespace_labels{namespace!~"(d8-.+|kube-system)",namespace=~"$namespace",label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy!~
"(privileged|restricted|baseline)",label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action!~"(deny|warn|dryrun)"}) by (namespace, label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy, label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action), "label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy", "$default_policy", "label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy", ".*"), "label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action", "$default_action", "label_security_deckhouse_io_pod_policy_action", ".*")

panels.description:
Description: The number of audit violations per constraint detected in the last audit cycle

Understanding this metric: During each run, the audit sums up all of the violations that it finds and reports these counts per-enforcement-mode.
panels.title: Total Violations

targets.expr: group(d8_gatekeeper_exporter_constraint_violations{violating_namespace=~".*"}) by (violating_kind, violating_namespace, violating_name, kind, violation_enforcement, violation_msg)

panels.description: The number of audit violations per constraint detected in the last audit cycle
panels.title: Total Violations

panels.description: Description: Timestamp of last audit run time
panels.title: Audit last run time

panels.description: Total number of GroupVersionKinds with a registered watch intent
panels.title: Total GroupVersionKinds registered

panels.description: Description: The number of requests that are routed to mutation webhook
panels.title: Mutation request count

panels.description: Description: The number of requests that are routed to validation webhook
panels.title: Validation request count

panels.description:
Description: Current number of constraint templates

Understanding this metric: Gatekeeper subscribes to a watch on all ConstraintTemplate resources. Whenever one is created or deleted on the cluster, this count gets updated.
panels.title: Constraint templates

panels.description:
Current number of constraints
Understanding this metric: Gatekeeper subscribes to a watch on all constraint resources. Whenever one is created or deleted on the cluster, this count gets updated.
panels.title: Constraints

panels.description:
Description: Constraint Template ingestion duration distribution

Understanding this metric: When Gatekeeper is notified of a new constraint template, records the time from when it has loaded the resource from etcd to after OPA successfully returns from compiling the code. If there is a compilation error, the metric is not updated.
panels.title: Constraint template ingestion duration
